ai-tika-s0402t33:1_0: Then—the wise ones, bright, flawless, and rid of surface—that’s what they did.
ai-tika-s0402t33:2_0: So there are mansions for the Nuns
ai-tika-s0402t33:3_0: The Sayings of the beautiful ones have been laid down on the ground.
ai-tika-s0402t33:4_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
